name: I Am The Hero
description: I Am The Hero is a pixel art, beat 'em up, fighting game that tells the story of a "Hero" with a glorious but mysterious past. Is he the hero he thinks he is or is there a another side to this legendary figure?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz+ or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
